name: Business Intelligence Data Analyst (BI)
description:
Responsibilities:

  • Conduct a study of where data originates, what it represents, and how it could be transformed into a valuable resource;
  • Be in charge of the entire BI report lifecycle: research, design, experimentation, development, deployment, monitoring, and maintenance;
  • Support analysts at business units through regular meetings;
  • Translate data into visualizations, improve existing dashboards;
  • Extract actionable insights from large databases.

Requirements:

  • Higher education (degree in physics, computer science, mathematics or statistics will be an asset);
  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in relevant area as a BI analyst;
  • Strong knowledge and experience of working with SQL;
  • Proficiency in Power BI (Tableau, Cognos, QlikView or similar BI systems);
  • Knowledge of Python and Scala, Hadoop and Hadoop SQL instruments (Impala, Hive, Scoop etc.) will be an asset;
  • Understanding of data mining techniques, machine learning practices and data management conceptual apparatus (Data Model, Data Architecture, Data Flow Diagram etc.) will be as well an advantage;
  • Experience in using data warehouse platforms;
  • Understanding of data quality check and improvement procedures;
  • Strong interpersonal skills and combination of analytical skills, intellectual curiosity, and reporting;
  • English: Intermediate level or higher.

Company offers:

  • Friendly and professional team, modern office located at Mezhdunarodnaya metro station (Moscow City);
  • Good social package: meal compensation, medical and accident insurance, partial compensation of fitness and English lessons;
  • Schedule with a flexible start of the working day: 8:00/8:30/9:00.
